department: DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES (PSPC)
short_summary: Installation of a battery test system to a the National Research Council of Canada.
description: This contract requires the installation of a battery test system to the National Research Council of Canada. The system should be compatible with single-cell testing and cycling for Lithium Ion Batteries and Vanadium Redox flow Batterers.
full_summary:
